turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Nadym.
turn.1: What was the main line of communication in Nadym?
turn.2: A railway branch passes through Nadym between Novy Urengoy and Salekhard which is closed and inactivated (also called "dead road", a Stalinist-era road).
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: At some point in time a bridge across the Ob river to Salekhard Labytnangi was planned.
turn.6: To date, the only construction is the railway Salekhard-Nadym.
turn.7: What other lines of communication were built?
turn.8: Most roads across the river Nadym were opened in September 2015.
turn.9: Did they receive any other lines of communication?
turn.10: A bridge across the Ob River is also in the planning along with a road running parallel to the railroad.
turn.11: Was there ever an airport in the area?
turn.12: The Nadym Airport is on the west bank of the Nadym River.
